name: Gooey
description:
Jyroz Collection #1 - "Gooey"

Meet Gooey, the friendly

He always wanted to be a hero, which is why he dedicated a large part of his childhood learning robotics and making what later became his weapons

It was a hard road, but over the years he gained the respect and affection of society. Not so for the other heroes

He likes to be around people, so he participates in special conventions where he can show off his inventions

His most precious item, however, is not created by himself, it is the Katana that he got after fighting side by side with Nakano Takeko, his only hero friend
